description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>Grandmaster at Arms</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Light of Icathia</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: Grandmaster at Arms.
Auto-Equip: The Light of Icathia.
levelupDescription: Equipped allies have struck for 12+ damage. <style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Equipped allies have struck for 12+ damage.
flavorText: Centuries ago, Jax lost his homeland to the Void. Now, he travels the world, searching for warriors with the strength of will--and the sheer gall--to one day stand against that terrible foe.
name: Jax

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The World Ender</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.item><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Blade</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 2 and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>World Ender</style></link> in hand if you don't have one.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The World Ender.
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Blade.
When I'm summoned or strike: Heal your Nexus 2 and create a World Ender in hand if you don't have one.
flavorText: Even across continents, Aatrox felt her awakening. How the hatred still burned. He had already broken her statues, now he could wage a final war against the Coward of Icathia, and through destroying her, end this pitiful existence.
name: Aatrox

description:
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: If my bearer is not a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Darkinthrall</style></link>, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Darkinthrall</style></link>.
You may spend 6 mana and kill an ally to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Xolaani</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Last Breath: If my bearer is not a Darkinthrall, summon a Darkinthrall.
You may spend 6 mana and kill an ally to play me as Xolaani.
flavorText: As the fighting raged on, Jun, desperate and badly wounded, turned to the voice whispering in her thoughts. "You will never die," it said, soft as summer rain, "because I will never let you."
name: The Darkin Bloodletters

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Create a new 2 cost spell in hand and give it Fleeting.
flavorText:
"Oh dear, sounds like rain."
"Huh? Dad, it's so bright outside."
"Quick, cover the blueprints! It's a BRAINstorm!"
"Daaaaad."
- Seraphine & her father
name: Inspired Plans

description: Your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: Your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavorText:
"Location: Sector 3, Underway 19B
Item: Illegal Firearm
Notes: Confiscated during Operation: Sumplight. Weapon is highly dangerous. Handle with extreme care."
- Piltover Warden field report
name: Gatalyst v1.0

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Shadow Reaper</style></link>.
<link=vocab.AutoEquip><style=Vocab>Auto-Equip</style></link>: <link=card.equipment><style=AssociatedCard>The Darkin Scythe</style></link>.
When I kill an enemy, heal me 2.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Shadow Reaper.
Auto-Equip: The Darkin Scythe.
When I kill an enemy, heal me 2.
levelupDescription: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> twice.<style=Variable></style> When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck twice. When I level up, Recall me.
flavorText: As another body fell, Kayn let out a gleeful laugh, knowing that he would soon unleash the second Darkin weapon that lay below. Within him, Rhaast's anticipation grew, knowing that Kaynâ€™s undoing was finally near.
name: Kayn

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Rune Mage</style></link>.
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Delve Into The Pasts</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Rune Mage.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create 2 Delve Into The Pasts in your deck.
flavorText: Ryze crested the ridge, accompanied by Kayle's silent servant. He looked down on a land scarred by war, and caught sight of the darkin monstrosities warring below. For centuries, he had watched on as humanity veered from one catastrophe to another. What if, he thought, his efforts were futile, and Runeterra was doomed to die?"
name: Ryze

description: You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Naganeka of Zuretta</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: You may spend 8 mana to play me as Naganeka of Zuretta.
flavorText: The steppes of eastern Valoran were known to be barren, unfit to feed or home the Noxii people. But as the centuries fell by, a new empire was founded, hungry for expansion. Fallow lands found new fertility under new farming techniques, and weapons once thought safely buried become uncovered once again.
name: The Darkin Ballista

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonling</style></link>. 
You may spend 9 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Praa the Breachwalker</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Summon an attacking Dragonling. 
You may spend 9 mana to play me as Praa the Breachwalker.
flavorText: "In the bridge between worlds, I have long sensed a shadow that pulses with silent rage. Though I know better than to delve into the darkness after it, the pulse has lately grown stronger, faster--and I fear  the creatures of the spirit realm will soon begin searching for it." - Shen
name: The Darkin Fan

description: <link=vocab.Flow><style=Vocab>Flow</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
descriptionRaw: Flow: I cost 2 less.
flavorText: "Blade and body." - Master Yi
name: Soul Sword

description:
<link=keyword.Support><style=Keyword>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Horazi</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Support: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Horazi.
flavorText: Perhaps those who imprisoned the Darkin thought that burying the legendary warrior Horazi within an orb of star metal would sufficiently dim her irascible will. But as her general stirred, so too did Horazi, who found that even Targon's ancient protectors could be tempted by promises whispered from afar.
name: The Darkin Lodestone

flavorText: The standard sword and shield of choice for Demacia's helmeted brothers-in-arms.
name: Demacian Steel

description:
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as <link=card.unit><style=AssociatedCard>Anaakca</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
You may spend 8 mana to play me as Anaakca.
flavorText:
"Warmother, the grip of winter has tightened. The Avarosans have fled beyond their outposts. North is the sea... our only path leads east."
"Do not listen to him, Warmother. That way is the Pale, and beyond it, the whispering wilds. I say better to die than face that cursed land."
"How fortunate for you both that neither must decide my people's fate."
"True, Warmother. But perhaps there is a third way. Let me travel east. Better a scout is lost to darkness than all of our people."
- Warmother Sejuani conferring with her generals
name: The Darkin Spear

flavorText: "Crunch!" - Tarkaz the Tribeless
name: Bone Club

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: I cost 2 less.
flavorText:
"Like the saying goes, nothin' ends a Bilgewater quarrel faster than a cutlass."
"Except maybe a pistol."
"Shut up, Baz."
- Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
name: Jagged Cutlass

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 2.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Spawn 2.
flavorText: "Stand strong beneath Her gaze!" - Illaoi
name: Eye of God

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Wandering Caretaker</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.chime><style=AssociatedCard>Chimes</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Wandering Caretaker.
Attack: Plant 3 Chimes in your deck.
levelupDescription: You've increased the total stats of allies in play or hand by <nobr>20+.<style=Variable></style></nobr>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've increased the total stats of allies in play or hand by 20+.
flavorText: "Aye, Old Gaff's seen his share o' strange! First time was the Caretaker 'imself, I reckon. Like a star streamin' 'cross the sky, he was. Felt like the whole world stopped a minute, and it was just me 'n' himâ€¦" - Old Gaffâ€™s tale, part 1
name: Bard

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Virtuoso</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to all <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> enemies.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Virtuoso. 
Attack: Deal 2 to all Stunned enemies.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played 12+ Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills.
flavorText: "Overture: We open on the city of Qayanvi, where an old master summons a young pupil. He is tasked with disposing a group of nefarious villains and recovering stolen sacred artifacts. The actor is keen, but he does not as yet take his place. For now he simply prepares, waiting in the wings."
name: Jhin

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>Agony's Embrace</style></link>.
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: Agony's Embrace.
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
levelupDescription: When I see you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round and I level up.
levelupDescriptionRaw: When I see you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round and I level up.
flavorText: The priestess' pupils were blown wide, and her hand trembled with nervous excitement. She was ready. This was the single moment Evelynn craved more than any other. She grinned, and slowly shed her visage. Then, as always, the screaming began.
name: Evelynn

description: When Iâ€™m summoned, if you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When Iâ€™m summoned, if you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+0 and Elusive.
flavorText: "What's my secret? You'll have to ask the biceps. They do all the talking."
name: Swole Scout

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: "What's that, boy? Two of the recruits were scouting in the woods and stumbled across a scary grass monster, and now they might die a long and painful death? Lead the way!" - Teemo
name: Puffcap Pup

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: If there is no greater pain than the papercut, then there is no one who better understands pain than the librarian.
name: Wizened Wizard

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round or grant me <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give me Barrier this round or grant me Impact.
flavorText: The Blastcone Seedlings are shy creatures, and while they will retreat first and foremost, if threatened...
name: Blastcone Seedling

description:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a multi-region follower.
descriptionRaw:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
Play: Manifest a multi-region follower.
flavorText: It's unclear whether Bandle City ever really elected a mayor, but an enormous mustache would almost certainly be a prerequisite.
name: Bandle City Mayor

description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: "Okay, Plan A: We blast our way in and start shooting. If that doesn't work, we go to Plan B: Blast our way out and keep shooting. Then, we'll regroup and go to Plan C, which is basically Plan A again..."
name: Tristana

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
flavorText: "An' den DAT Bobjim da poro was like "DAT WAY!" an' so off dey went into da horizahn, with da other poros scamperin' behind, tryin' their bestest to keep up!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Poro Sled

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Tiny Spear</style></link> or a <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Tiny Shield</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create a Tiny Spear or a Tiny Shield in hand.
flavorText: "My spear used to belong to a great hero, too... I made Poppy hold it for a minute!"
name: Yordle Squire

description: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Oh yes, she's quite the mirror master. She makes my designs look even more sublime, and with a small trick of the light, even manages to lend a certain someone a touch of much needed verticality..." - Stilted Robemaker
name: Mirror Mage

description: When Iâ€™m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
descriptionRaw: When Iâ€™m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
flavorText: "Worst. Trip. Ever." - Elle
name: Aloof Travelers

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: I deal 1 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: I deal 1 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText:
"It's IMPORTANT we make a good impression. The new safety inspector is stopping by, and you know what that means!"
"No more explosions?"
"WHAT?! No! It means explode things where he can't see 'em! 'No more explosions'... are you crazy?!" - Ziggs and Otto
name: Ziggs

description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> or <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally Barrier or SpellShield this round.
flavorText: "I'll protect you with my wild and furious... meow!" - Yuumi
name: Friendship!

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Then, if I've seen allies from 10 regions, win the game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Then, if I've seen allies from 10 regions, win the game.
flavorText: Stretching an unknowable distance into the heavens above, The Bandle Tree is an impossible fixture at the heart of the city. Under its great, gnarled branches, some yordles see a beacon of hope and friendship while others see an ominous, riddle-filled monolith. All agree that to gaze upon the Bandle Tree is to glance into the soul of something very old and very powerful.
name: The Bandle Tree

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it survives, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If it survives, Stun it.
flavorText: "Move it!" - Poppy
name: Heroic Charge

description: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
descriptionRaw: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
flavorText: The Bawkatrice is a loyal, steadfast mount under normal circumstances. However, when put under too much stress they are known to react in... unusual ways.
name: Stress Defense

description: Transform a unit into a 3|3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mini-Minitee</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Transform a unit into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it.
flavorText: "Oh-ho! How cute! How adorable! How TINY!" - Veigar
name: Minimorph

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Prank</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Prank in hand.
flavorText:
"Curious and playful, the otterpus are an immensely cheery bunch. Or is it otterpi? Say, didn't I pack a third sandwich?" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 7
name: Otterpus

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. <style=Variable></style>
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. 
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
flavorText: Wherever Ziggs went, Arnie followed, his serene demeanor a natural foil to Ziggs' chaotic zeal. His duties ranged from making sure the munitions were stocked, to putting out fires, to clapping his hands over Ziggs' ears when Ziggs (inevitably) forgot hearing protection.
name: The Arsenal

description: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
flavorText:
"Note to self: On next expedition, keep all valuables in my FRONT pockets." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 19
name: Tricksy Tentacles

description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Megatee</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Megatee.
flavorText: Things minitees like: napping on the warm summerstones beside the Nakotak tribal lands. Things minitees do not like: being shoved off said summerstones by cheeky yordles...
name: Minitee

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant the unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me +1|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me +1|+1 instead.
levelupDescription: I or the unit I'm <link=keyword.Attach><sprite name=Attach><style=Keyword>Attached</style></link> to have attacked 3 times.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I or the unit I'm Attached to have attacked 3 times.
flavorText: Yuumi did have to admit that for all her fussing, she did like Book quite a lot. She liked its smell. She liked its illustrations. She even liked jumping through its portals! ...but nothing was as good as just having Norra back home, safe and sound.
name: Yuumi

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
flavorText: Humility is a mark of heroism, but many historians would agree that Poppy is kind of pushing it.
name: Poppy

description: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
flavorText:
"I used to be like youâ€“couldn't even lift a puffcap. But then, I found "Shake: by Purpleberry." It's got all the right stuff a yordle needs to go from zero to hero. So when you've had a hard workout, fuel up with 'Shake,' and become the buffest of bros, like me!" 
- Printed Advertisement
name: Purpleberry Shake

description: When Iâ€™m summoned, if youâ€™ve summoned a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Thunder Fist</style></link> this game, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Masa, Crashing Thunder</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When Iâ€™m summoned, if youâ€™ve summoned a Thunder Fist this game, transform me into Masa, Crashing Thunder.
flavorText: As Masa struck the training dummy, a flash of lightning erupted from the fist, splitting the wood in two and singeing the hair on his hands. He pulled on the rope, reeling in the bronze hand and reflecting on his trainingâ€”he was finally ready. Suddenly, a monstrous roar echoed in the distance.
name: Thunder Fist

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
flavorText:
"Today is indeed a red letter day! An exploration into the deep! I expect things to proceed quite... swimmingly! Ho ho!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 1
name: Conchologist

description: When Iâ€™m summoned or you destroy me, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When Iâ€™m summoned or you destroy me, Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "What do you mean, 'this doesn't look safe'?" - Ziggs
name: Hexplosive Minefield

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Double my Power and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Double my Power and Impact.
flavorText:
"They say I'm a joke. That I've got dirt for brains. That I'm all tremble and no quake. Well I've just got one thing to say to my opponents...  I'm gonna rock your world!" 
- Pre-match interview
name: Earthshaker

description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: The mechs and yordles were bruised, battered, beaten. Then a clarion call sounded, granting them new steam, new life: Doot doot!
name: Trumpetecher

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Grant your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
flavorText: Darkness comes in all shapes and sizes. Some of them SURPRISINGLY adorable.
name: Twisted Catalyzer

description: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Bouncing Bomb

description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
flavorText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
name: Ricochet

description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
flavorText: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.
name: Xenotype Researchers

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."
name: Raz Bloodmane

description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
descriptionRaw:
An ally Strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
flavorText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus
name: Siphoning Strike

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton
name: Rite of Dominance

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Sand Soldier.
flavorText:
"As the emperor commands, both the sand and I obey."
-------
"Word of Azir's return has spread across the deserts, from Shurima to the world beyond. I have ensured that myself."
name: Dunekeeper

description: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
descriptionRaw: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
flavorText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean
name: Chronoshift

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Instant Centuries</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Instant Centuries in hand.
flavorText: The constant rumble in the lower levels of the tower are due to The Clock Hand, the tower guardian that steadily winds the gears below.
name: The Clock Hand

description:
Summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
Draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon 2 Roiling Sands.
Draw 1.
flavorText: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.
name: Unraveled Earth

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
flavorText:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Rock Hopper

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. If you pick a landmark, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict. If you pick a landmark, grant me Elusive.
flavorText:
"We had trouble earlier! A great storm threatened from the west, and Taliyah passed xer'sai tunnels to the south. I spotted a temple to the north, and we are now safe inside its terracotta walls. The others are all asleep, and my flame, like me, is ebbing. I hope I dream well."
- Zaifa's diary
name: Sai Scout

description: I cost 1 less for each time an ally attacked this game.
descriptionRaw: I cost 1 less for each time an ally attacked this game.
flavorText: Upon Azir's return, Shurimans caught sight of ancient beasts of legend, made of sand but no less impressive.
name: Sandstone Chimera

description: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've struck for 10+ damage in one strike.
flavorText: "Nasus' newly won blessing allowed him countless lifetimes to spend in study and contemplation over the nature of life and death. But this same extended lifespan would, after the fall of Shurima, also prove to be his curse." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Nasus

description:
<link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3 less. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Finds</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Reputation: I cost 3 less. 
Countdown 1: Create 2 Lucky Finds in hand.
flavorText: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir
name: Inner Sanctum

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Exalted Poro</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into Exalted Poro.
flavorText: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.
name: Destined Poro

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: The Sandcrafters lifted their hands, willing the sand into the familiar shape of armored, faceless soldiers, a tireless army ready to fight for their god-emperor.
name: Emperor's Dais

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Waking Sands</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Waking Sands in hand.
flavorText: "Okay, Davu. You're gonna go in there, grab that... whatever it is, and you're going to make us rich. Me rich. You're going to make me rich. Got it? Also, if that's a trapped thing, I am real sorry in advance."
name: Treasure Seeker

flavorText: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.
name: Ruin Runner

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavorText: "My friend, for you I've procured this incomparable beauty straight from the fabled Tomb of the Emperors and pulled it right from the hand of the great Renekton himself and as I rode out, I was surrounded by ten--twenty!--bloodthirsty sauren riders! Truly, a miracle that such a treasure has made it to your hands."
name: Profiteer

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.
name: Sandcrafter

description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavorText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
name: Rite of Negation

description: When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
flavorText: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Renekton

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict.
flavorText: Not all xer'sai are born to butcher. Some can summon their kin with piercing shrieks that rattle the sands as well as the senses.
name: Xer'sai Caller

description: When I'm summoned, grant allied champions and landmarks <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant allied champions and landmarks SpellShield.
flavorText: "Ah, you did not expect to see water in the middle of the desert. Worry not. Come, drink your fill, wash your feet. Rest in the shade awhile. This is Azir's new Shurima, and it is an oasis."
name: Soothsayer

description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
flavorText: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."
name: Voice of the Risen

description:
<link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw:
Predict.
Give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "I have seen my destiny, and this time, I will not be stopped." - Azir
name: Scrying Sands

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
flavorText: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.
name: Baccai Sandspinner

description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +2|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +2|+1 instead.
flavorText: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah
name: Shaped Stone

description: When you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you slay a unit, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Baccai Reaper

description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavorText: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Azir
